goals__remit:
League of Arab People organization   accredited to the UN, EU and UN Global compact, It has many ambassadors all over the Arab countries 
we participated in the Conference of anti religious terrorism in the Netherlands, the conference of listen to Africa to solve the problems of Africa on the European Parliament, the International Human Rights Conference in Lebanon, the International Compact for Media in Lebanon and many other conferences 
It works to discuss the problems of the Arab countries and to conduct studies to solve them And present these solutions to officials 
Defending human rights, the Arab nation and the care of women and disabled children 
Attention to Arab communities abroad and their problems and trying to solve them
